name: zog-intern
description: - Create a REST API  TypeScript and Express (or anything you like) About News and Topic management.  - You can use any SQL/NoSQL storage with your own data model. - CRUD on News and Topic.  - One news can contains multiple topics e.g. "use typescript for production" might contain topics such as  "programming", "javascript", etc.  - One topic has multiple news e.g. "car" topic might contain "how to maintain a car",  "new car released this month", etc.  - Enable filter by news status ("draft", "deleted", "publish").  - Enable filter news by its topics.
